SEARCH

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
Cell
public class Cell extends Object
Cells are the building blocks of the board. Each cell is a hexagon, but the Cell class doesn't directly extend the JavaFX Polygon class since cells include torches and assigned atoms.

      public double[] midpoint(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Finds the midpoint of two points Its applied purpose is finding the centre of the side of a cell
      Parameters:
      x1 -
      y1 -
      x2 -
      y2 -
      Returns:
      double[] wrapped coordinates of the midpoint

    • getAdjacentHexagon

      public Cell getAdjacentHexagon(Direction direction)
      Method uses a switch statement and external methods to find neighbor of a cell in a given direction When applied, this method will sometimes return null This is intended and helps map the board's edges
      Parameters:
      direction - enum. type used to represent slope
      Returns:
      reference to cell in that direction if found, null otherwise
